Fin Williamson

I like to code things, and teach others how to code things too. I specialize in sleek web design and unique ineractive design

I am an Aspiring...

  • Educator

    Hey there! If you've found yourself on this page it's most likely that you're here on behalf of the admissions team of a university in Glasgow. Until I progress my Web Dev portfolio further this is all for your benefit!

    Unfotunately, due to the circumstances this year i have not had the opportunity to gain any practical experience. However as things open up soon here are a few things that I am looking forward to!

    Talking
    Teaching

    Teaching Scotland are providing a number of seminars this January during their “Online Festival of Interactive Events”

    Classroom
    Observations

    Having reached out to a number of local schools, as well as friends that are already teachers, it must be true that good things come to those that wait

    Hello
    Whorld!

    Hello Whorld is a series of tutorials that I have been working on with the hope of volunteering in schools that cannot offer a Computer Science curriculum.
